Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.jmolViewer.base

Class Jmol3dController

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.jmolViewer.base.Jmol3dController
Direct Known Subclasses:
Jmol3dBoxController, Jmol3dPeptideController
public abstract class Jmol3dController extends Object
Controller class for the DpdJmolViewer.
Author:
Andreas Truszkowski

      Returns:
      Scene image.

      height - Height of the image.

    • setRotation

      public void setRotation(javax.vecmath.Vector3d aRotation)
      Rotates the scene by given vector (in degrees).
      Parameters:
      aRotation - Rotation vector consisting of euler angles.

    • setRotation

      public void setRotation(int aX, int aY, int aZ)
      Rotates the scene by given values.
      Parameters:
      aX - X direction in degrees.
      aY - Y direction in degrees.
      aZ - Z direction in degrees.

    • getRotation

      Gets the current rotation in Euler angles.
      Returns:

    • handleMouseEvent

      protected abstract void handleMouseEvent(MouseEvent e)
      Method for handling mouse events. Only events from the Jmol rendering panel will be routed.
      Parameters:
      e - Mouse event.

    • handleMouseWheelEvent

      protected abstract void handleMouseWheelEvent(MouseWheelEvent e)
      Method for handling mousewheel events. Only events from the Jmol rendering panel will be routed.

      e - Mousewheel event.
